name: Modern Chronological Resume
des: This modern chronological resume or CV emphasizes your experience by showing your most recent jobs first. Use this chronological resume template to create a resume and use the matching cover letter for a professional job search package. Follow a professional chronological resume format using this accessible modern resume template.

name: Basic Modern Resume
des: Use this modern resume template to create a resume that gets results. You don't need a flashy design to get the job. This modern professional templates features a simple, clean look.
